title: Pager apps not working since update, not overriding. Not alerting me to a message for a shout. HELP!
content:
Hey, since the most recent update on my pixel3, my pager apps do not override the silent mode nor do they alert me that a message has come through requesting my attendance at my local coastguard station. This is exceedingly frustrating as I am not attending when I would be free. 
How can an app now read messages and alert the owner? I was using FireAlert and Emergency Alert successfully until the update. Thanks
